widget.header: Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

config.title: Short Videos (Legal Content).
config.description: We produced and uploaded two new short videos about Wrongful Termination and Wills (Mexican Law) to our Justia YouTube Channel.

config.title: Justia Elevate.
config.description: We've launched the Justia AI Writer, a robust feature integrated into Elevate. This AI-powered tool automatically generates top-notch content, simplifying the addition of fresh content to lawyers' websites.

config.title: Justia Connect.
config.description: We now have our own On-Demand CLE platform, granting our team full control over every facet of our on-demand webinar user experience. Furthermore, it enables us to eliminate the subpar quality third-party on-demand CLE service.

config.title: New Legacy Elevate Infrastructure.
config.description: We've created a new and significantly improved cloud environment to provide higher availability and security to our legacy website clients. In the upcoming days, we will be migrating several of our clients' websites to this new setup.

config.title: IT Maintenance.
config.description: Our IT Team successfully handled the required infrastructure maintenance. This month the involved properties were Justia Client Blogs and Oyez.org

config.title: GA4.
config.description: We've implemented a new feature that facilitates the seamless switching of Google Analytics 4 (GA4) accounts for our clients' websites and blogs. This enhancement offers enhanced flexibility and simplifies analytics management for our users.

config.title: Summary Newsletters Tracking.
config.description: We've enhanced the quality of our summary newsletters by integrating advanced tracking capabilities. This allows our team to conduct a more efficient analysis of user behavior, delivering valuable insights into how our content is being used.

config.title: Justia Mexico Portal Content Updates.
config.description: We have updated and published the Commercial Code and the Tax Code on our Mexico site.
